name: py-biopython

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: orthofiller
dependent_to.description:
OrthoFiller: Identifying missing annotations for evolutionarily
conserved genes.

dependent_to.name: py-haphpipe
dependent_to.description:
HAplotype and PHylodynamics pipeline for viral assembly, population
genetics, and phylodynamics.

dependent_to.name: py-cmseq
dependent_to.description:
CMSeq is a set of commands to provide an interface to .bam files for
coverage and sequence consensus.

dependent_to.name: py-panaroo
dependent_to.description: A Bacterial Pangenome Analysis Pipeline

dependent_to.name: py-fastfold
dependent_to.description:
Optimizing Protein Structure Prediction Model Training and Inference on
GPU Clusters.

dependent_to.name: py-tesorter
dependent_to.description:
TEsorter is coded for LTR_retriever to classify long terminal repeat
retrotransposons (LTR-RTs) at first. It can also be used to classify any
other transposable elements (TEs), including Class I and Class II
elements which are covered by the REXdb database.

dependent_to.name: emblmygff3
dependent_to.description:
EMBLmyGFF3 converts an assembly in FASTA format along with associated
annotation in GFF3 format into the EMBL flat file format which is the
required format for submitting annotated assemblies to ENA.

dependent_to.name: py-pyvolve
dependent_to.description:
Pyvolve is an open-source Python module for simulating sequences along a
phylogenetic tree according to continuous-time Markov models of sequence
evolution

dependent_to.name: py-angel
dependent_to.description: ANGEL: Robust Open Reading Frame prediction

dependent_to.name: py-biobb-structure-checking
dependent_to.description:
Biobb_structure_checking provides a series of functions to check the
quality of a 3D structure intended to facilitate the setup of a
molecular dynamics simulation of protein or nucleic acids systems

dependent_to.name: py-drep
dependent_to.description:
dRep is a python program for rapidly comparing large numbers of genomes.
dRep can also "de-replicate" a genome set by identifying groups of
highly similar genomes and choosing the best representative genome for
each genome set.

dependent_to.name: py-deepsig-biocomp
dependent_to.description:
DeepSig - Predictor of signal peptides in proteins based on deep
learning

dependent_to.name: py-phydms
dependent_to.description:
phydms enables phylogenetic analyses using deep mutational scanning data
to inform the substitution models. It implements Experimentally informed
codon models (ExpCM) for phylogenetic inference and the detection of
biologically interesting selection.

dependent_to.name: py-pyani
dependent_to.description:
pyani is a Python3 module that provides support for calculating average
nucleotide identity (ANI) and related measures for whole genome
comparisons, and rendering relevant graphical summary output. Where
available, it takes advantage of multicore systems, and can integrate
with SGE/OGE-type job schedulers for the sequence comparisons.

dependent_to.name: py-pastml
dependent_to.description:
Ancestral character reconstruction and visualisation for rooted
phylogenetic trees.

dependent_to.name: py-pauvre
dependent_to.description: pauvre: plotting package designed for nanopore and PacBio long reads

dependent_to.name: shortbred
dependent_to.description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.

dependent_to.name: py-nanoget
dependent_to.description:
Functions to extract information from Oxford Nanopore sequencing data
and alignments

dependent_to.name: py-phylophlan
dependent_to.description:
PhyloPhlAn 3.0 is an integrated pipeline for large-scale phylogenetic
profiling of genomes and metagenomes.

dependent_to.name: hybpiper
dependent_to.description:
HybPiper was designed for targeted sequence capture, in which DNA
sequencing libraries are enriched for gene regions of interest,
especially for phylogenetics. HybPiper is a suite of Python scripts that
wrap and connect bioinformatics tools in order to extract target
sequences from high-throughput DNA sequencing reads

dependent_to.name: py-nanoplot
dependent_to.description: Plotting scripts for long read sequencing data

dependent_to.name: py-breakseq2
dependent_to.description: nucleotide-resolution analysis of structural variants

dependent_to.name: s4pred
dependent_to.description:
A tool for accurate prediction of a protein's secondary structure from
only its amino acid sequence with no evolutionary information

dependent_to.name: py-metaphlan
dependent_to.description:
MetaPhlAn is a computational tool for profiling the composition of
microbial communities (Bacteria, Archaea and Eukaryotes) from
metagenomic shotgun sequencing data (i.e. not 16S) with species-level.

dependent_to.name: py-shortbred
dependent_to.description:
ShortBRED is a system for profiling protein families of interest at very
high specificity in shotgun meta'omic sequencing data.

dependent_to.name: busco
dependent_to.description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs

dependent_to.name: py-alphafold
dependent_to.description:
AlphaFold is an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts a
protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence. It regularly
achieves accuracy competitive with experiment.

dependent_to.name: py-bcbio-gff
dependent_to.description: Read and write Generic Feature Format (GFF) with Biopython integration.

dependent_to.name: py-topiary-asr
dependent_to.description: Python framework for doing ancestral sequence reconstruction.

dependent_to.name: py-biobb-common
dependent_to.description: Biobb_common is the base package required to use the biobb packages

dependent_to.name: phyluce
dependent_to.description:
phyluce (phy-loo-chee) is a software package that was initially
developed for analyzing data collected from ultraconserved elements in
organismal genomes

dependent_to.name: py-instrain
dependent_to.description:
inStrain is python program for analysis of co-occurring genome
populations from metagenomes that allows highly accurate genome
comparisons, analysis of coverage, microdiversity, and linkage, and
sensitive SNP detection with gene localization and synonymous non-
synonymous identification.

dependent_to.name: py-mdanalysis
dependent_to.description:
MDAnalysis is a Python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics
trajectories generated by a wide range of popular simulation packages
including DL_Poly, CHARMM, Amber, NAMD, LAMMPS, and Gromacs. (See the
lists of supported trajectory formats and topology formats.)

dependent_to.name: isescan
dependent_to.description:
A python pipeline to identify IS (Insertion Sequence) elements in genome
and metagenome

dependent_to.name: py-bakta
dependent_to.description:
Bakta: rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs &
plasmids

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: pharokka
dependent_to.description:
pharokka is a rapid standardised annotation pipeline for bacteriophage
genomes

dependent_to.name: roary
dependent_to.description: Rapid large-scale prokaryote pan genome analysis

dependent_to.name: py-vcf-kit
dependent_to.description:
VCF-kit is a command-line based collection of utilities for performing
analysis on Variant Call Format (VCF) files.

dependent_to.name: py-wub
dependent_to.description:
Bioinformatics tools and a software library developed by the Oxford
Nanopore Technologies Applications group.
